wikipedia_page.main: Ross Weatherstone (born 16 May 1981) is a former English footballer who played in the Football League for Oxford United and Boston United. Ross comes from a football family, his brother Simon Weatherstone is also a former footballer at the same clubs. Simon Weatherstone is now working as First Team Coach at Newcastle United. Ross has moved into Management at the Non-League level, he is now Hartley Wintney FC's U23s Manager.

response: Weatherstone started his career at Oxford United. Where he made his Professional Debut in Division 1, now known as the Championship in 1997. Simon scored his 1st Professional Goal Versus Nottingham Forest at the City Ground in 1998. In February 2001 Simon was transferred to Boston United on the 16th February 2001, along with his brother Ross Weatherstone in the same deal.
